document_data.name: Ysdar
document_data.mainbody: '''Ysdar''' was an old and wicked power of the [[Outer Planes]] that based itself in the [[Utter East]] and desired the destruction of all life there.
document_data.History: [[Mar]] legend in [[Edenvale]] said Ysdar was a [[devil]] from another world, called the king of the [[Forgotten Ones]]. He was released during the [[Bloodforge Wars]], when the Lords of the [[Five Kingdoms]] weakened his prison.
document_data.Description: He was said to be so ugly that looking on him would drive a person mad. [[Atreus Eleint]], who journeyed from [[Duhlnarim]] to [[Langdarma]] in the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, on a quest to steal sparkling water for his goddess [[Sune]] and become handsome, was called "Ysdar" or "a devil of Ysdar" by people from Edenvale as an insult, owing to how ugly he was.
document_data.Worshipers: Ysdar was worshiped by the [[Fallen Temple]], who, in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}, attempted a plan to fully raise their god.<ref>
